article_title: OPM Data Breach Tops List of ‘Federal Fumbles’
article_text: Security and regulatory concerns have limited health care providers’ use of offshore IT services, but pressure to reduce costs is prompting them to find ways to leverage the offshore model while safeguarding sensitive data.

twitter.description: In annual list of costly government mishaps, a Republican Senator chides the agency for not heeding IT security warnings.
twitter.title: OPM Data Breach Tops List of ‘Federal Fumbles’
